name: Fairest of Scenes
description: A model of a Sightseeing Scope equipped with an adjustable, stable tripod that can be folded for storage, identical to the ones seen during the Lantern Rite in Liyue.\nCountless vistas have been viewed through the scope's lens. Yet among them all, surely the most beautiful was the sight of Liyue Harbor, basking in the joy of peace and festive celebration...
